DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effect VX-770 Desipramine
DOC.criteria: Subjects must male female 18 55 year age Subject must body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 Subject must judge good health History illness , opinion investigator subject 's general practitioner , might confound result study pose additional risk administer study drug ( ) subject Subjects human immunodeficiency virus , hepatitis C , active hepatitis B Female subject male subject female partner ( ) pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant study within 90 day last dose study drug
